      • sendTownMessage

        @Deprecated
public static void sendTownMessage(Town town,
                                               List<String> lines)
        Deprecated. 
        Send a message to all online residents of a town Doesn't use a [Towny] or [TownName] prefix. It is prefered to use sendPrefixedTownMessage or sendTownMessagePrefixed.
        Parameters:
        town - to receive message
        lines - String list to send as a message

      • sendNationMessage

        @Deprecated
public static void sendNationMessage(Nation nation,
                                                 List<String> lines)
        Deprecated. 
        Send a message to all online residents of a nation Doesn't use a [Towny] or [NationName] prefix. It is prefered to use sendPrefixedNationMessage or sendNationMessagePrefixed.
        Parameters:
        nation - nation to receive message
        lines - String list to send as a message

                                throws TownyException

public static void sendTownMessage(Town town,
                                               String[] lines)
        Deprecated. 
        Send a multi-line message to All online residents of a town and log Doesn't use a [Towny] or [TownName] prefix. It is prefered to use sendPrefixedTownMessage or sendTownMessagePrefixed.
        Parameters:
        town - the town to send a message to
        lines - array of Strings constituting the message.
